publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6300 Bill Butler: Happy Birthday Drumchapel Community Credit Union—That the Parliament congratulates Drumchapel Community Credit Union (DCCU) on the occasion of its 40th anniversary; notes that it is widely acknowledged as having been the first credit union in Scotland; further notes that it currently has 2,500 full and 500 junior members; observes that, throughout the recession, credit unions have provided a safe and sustainable form of saving; acknowledges the contribution that DCCU and credit unions throughout Scotland make in providing low-cost loans and encouraging regular saving; salutes the commitment and efforts of all the staff and volunteers who have made DCCU such a success story over the last four decades, and wishes Drumchapel Community Credit Union every success for the future. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-6300 Bill Butler: Happy Birthday Drumchapel Community Credit Union—That the Parliament congratulates Drumchapel Community Credit Union (DCCU) on the occasion of its 40th anniversary; notes that it is widely acknowledged as having been the first credit union in Scotland; further notes that it currently has 2,500 full and 500 junior members; observes that, throughout the recession, credit unions have provided a safe and sustainable form of saving; acknowledges the contribution that DCCU and credit unions throughout Scotland make in providing low-cost loans and encouraging regular saving; salutes the commitment and efforts of all the staff and volunteers who have made DCCU such a success story over the last four decades, and wishes Drumchapel Community Credit Union every success for the future. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Claire Baker*, Jackie Baillie*, Cathy Jamieson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Mary Mulligan*, Brian Adam*, Marlyn Glen*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*
